name: Zombie bang Raider boom
description:
Zombie bang Raider boom.

This game was made for #myfirstgamejam and despite everything here it is. First I got sick. Then I got swamped with work. Then my artist got sick. I was working on this game up till the last seconds.

Game by Harley wolf @HarleyCanis

Art by Raven @musclebirb
